claim: Exports: WLS with exposure and rigidity controls (2016-2017 vs 2018-2019) yields a negative dem_share coefficient (p=0.0126).
Panel fixed-effects dem_share x post interaction is not significant for imports or exports.
Export pre-trend interactions are negative and significant in 2014 and 2017 in the 2012-2017 pretrend event study.
County exposure to tariff-targeted industries is weakly negatively correlated with Democratic vote share (corr = -0.06575).
Imports data by NAICS are available through the Census International Trade Imports (NAICS) time series API.
Exports data by NAICS are available through the Census International Trade Exports (NAICS) time series API.
QuantGov Section 301 tariff lists include HTS codes and import value fields.
CBP provides county employment counts used to construct industry employment weights.
source_quote: County Business Patterns (CBP) is an annual series that provides subnational economic data for establishments with paid employees by industry and employment size.

claim: County-level presidential returns are available from the MIT Election Lab.
source_quote: This dataset contains county-level returns for presidential elections from 2000 to 2024.

claim: Trade-policy theory emphasizes lobbying/special-interest influence on protection ("Protection for Sale").
source_quote: We develop a general "protection for sale" model of trade policy.

claim: Factor- and industry-based models predict different trade-policy coalitions (class vs industry cleavages).
source_quote: trade politics are primarily class-based if interindustry factor mobility is high, but industry-based if factor mobility is low.

claim: Export robustness (WLS pre-value, abs_log_change, 2016-2017 vs 2018-2019) remains negative (coef=-1.264, p=0.0356).
Robust regression (Huber RLM) for exports 2016-2017 vs 2018-2019 yields a near-zero coefficient (p=0.728).
Leave-one-out export OLS (2016-2017 vs 2018-2019) drops to -0.211 (p=0.335) when NAICS 211 is omitted.
Leave-one-out summary (exports, 2016-2017 vs 2018-2019) shows coefficients remain negative but range from -1.125 to -0.211 (median p=0.085).
Leave-one-out summary (exports, 2016-2017 vs 2019) shows coefficients range from -1.438 to -0.408 (median p=0.0408).
